metadata.title: Physica A The global dynamics for a stochastic SIS epidemic model with isolation

abstract.original_text: h i g h l i g h t s

sentences.segment_text: h i g h l i g h t s

abstract.original_text: • A stochastic SIS epidemic model with isolation and multiple noises perturbation is proposed.

sentences.segment_text: • A stochastic SIS epidemic model with isolation and multiple noises perturbation is proposed .

abstract.original_text: • The criteria on the extinction and persistence in the mean with probability one are obtained.

sentences.segment_text: • The criteria on the extinction and persistence in the mean with probability one are obtained .

abstract.original_text: • The sufficient conditions for the existence of unique stationary distribution are established.

sentences.segment_text: • The sufficient conditions for the existence of unique stationary distribution are established .
